snippet.title: GameCube Longplay [031] Shikigami no Shiro II (JP)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Tsunao

Shmup by Alfa Systems.

Something about...spirits? Maybe? There's some story in there. Shmup + Japanese = no plot!

Gameplay involves shooting things, naturally, holding shot button to do shikigami attack, and a good ol' bomb button. There's also a graze system where grazing attacks will increase attack power AND give higher score multiplier. Speaking of: score multiplier is affected by distance: the closer to enemy, the higher the multiplier.

This longplay spams shikigami as Kotaro. Recorded from Dolphin which has re-recording tools.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
